description.default: Add arbitrary script to a page

properties.script:
<div>sample text<div>

<script>
// It is preferred to use a self-executing function around your script if
// code should run on each page load
// See https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Glossary/IIFE
    (function () {
        // put script here
    })() 
</script>
properties.title: The Modern Script Editor web part!
